title: Fixed the local church roof
summary: We need to raise £1500 to get the roof fixed
content: Fixing church roofs really seems to gel with Nationwides community giving, plus they'd be doing good in the eyes of the lord.

title: Llanddewi Brefi Nationwide
summary: Set up a branch in Llanddewi Brefi
content: Because none of the other banks will!

title: Increase savings rates
summary: Increase the child savings account interest rate
content: It's important to invest in our future, and what better way for Nationwide to give back to us customers than by investing in our childrens future.

title: Lethal Weapon 7
summary: Fund the soon to be hit film: Lethal Weapon 7
content: It'll be a stonking great hit, sure to make millions, I require £13,500 in unmarked bills.
